snippet: Alex Ferguson appears to be in no rush for an infusion of talent during the January transfer period, despite Manchester United's recent swoon.
abstract: Alex Ferguson appears to be in no rush for an infusion of talent during the January transfer period, despite Manchester United's recent swoon.
lead_paragraph: He may see things that others cannot most of the time, but right now it seems that Alex Ferguson is blind to an issue in need of an urgent solution. Either that or he refuses to admit recognizing what everyone else perceives as a problem at Manchester United.

headline.main: At Manchester United, Ferguson Will Play His Hand
